name: market for manual dismantling of electric scooter | manual dismantling of electric scooter | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5345/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'manual dismantling of electric scooter', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is delivering the service of treatment of a used electric scooter with a manual dismantling. The process includes the treatment of 1 kg of scooter in specific disposal facilities.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
